title: Emmy Awards 2019: The nominees and winners
text:
Image copyright Getty Images

The 71st annual Primetime Emmy Awards are taking place in Los Angeles.

The ceremony follows the Creative Arts Emmys, held last weekend, which recognised excellence behind the scenes, in areas such as casting, costumes, make-up, sound and lighting.

Sunday night's ceremony focuses more on the major categories - including best actors, actresses and overall drama and comedy series.

Here's a rundown of the main nominees, updated live as the winners are announced.

WINNER: Fleabag
